physical_appearance: This is a cushion cover. It is square in shape, featuring a multicolored geometric scroling border and a cotton weave in the center. The front features a stylized embroidery of birds perched on a tree, with small flowers surrounding it.
subject_terms_1: embroidery (visual works) foliage (motif) flower (motif) birds (motifs) beadwork (visual works) cushions
